APR FC vs Kiyovu Sports

APR FC 1-0 Kiyovu Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

19:01

Hibutswe umufana wa APR FC uherutse kwitaba Imana


Mbere yâ€™umukino, amakipe yombi yafashe umunota wo kwibuka uwari umufana wâ€™akadasohoka ba APR FC, Kilimanjaro Deborah, uherutse kwitaba Imana

18:55

Ibyishimo byari byose kuri Byiringiro ubwo yafunguraga amazamu

18:19

Amwe mu mafoto yaranze igice cya kabiri cy'umukino

17:28

Umukino wahuzaga APR FC na Kiyovu Sports urarangiye

Ni ibyishimo bikomeye ku bakunzi ba APR FC bagiye kwinjira mu minsi ya Noheli bakeye kubera intsinzi imbere ya Kiyovu Sports bakesha igitego cya Byiringiro Lague cyabonetse mu gice cya mbere.

17:24

90' Iminota ine y'inyongera

Umusifuzi Ruzindana Nsoro yemeje ko hongerwaho iminota ine y'inyongera ku gihe gisanzwe

17:23

88' Birashya bishyira ibyishimo ku bakunzi ba APR FC

Nubwo abakinnyi ba Kiyovu Sports bari gukina neza ariko kureba mu izamu byanze. APR FC iri gucungira kuri 'contre attacque' ishobora gutahana amanota atatu.

17:17

82' Ba myugariro ba APR FC ntabwo bazibagirwa Ghislain Almer

Uyu rutahizamu w'umunya-Cameroun ntabwo asanzwe. Afashe umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo acenga abakinnyi batatu ba APR FC; Blaise Itangishaka, Herve Rugwiro na Emmanuel Imanishimwe yiruka cyane agera mu rubuga rw'amahina aha mugenzi we Babicka atera hejuru y'izamu

17:12

77' Mangwende ahise asimbuzwa

Uyu myugariro wo ku ruhande rw'ibumoso yababye kuko avuye mu kibuga hakoresheje agatanda k'abarwayi, ahita asimbuzwa Iranzi Jean Claude

17:10

75' Emmanuel Imanishimwe aryamye hasi

Umukino ubaye uhagaze, abaganga ba APR FC bari kwita kuri Emmanuel Imanishimwe bita Mangwende wakorewe ikosa na Jean Claude Rutsiro, binamuviriyemo ikarita y'umuhondo

17:08

73' Kiyovu Sports yongeye gusimbuza ikomeza ubusatirizi

Maombi Jean Pierre ukina hagati yugarira asimbuwe na Jean Didier Touya bavanye muri LLB y'i Burundi

17:03

70' Abafana ba APR FC ntabwo bishimiye imyanzuro y'umusifuzi

Jean Pierre Maombi agerageje gucenga Evode Ntwari amukorera ikosa ariko umupira urakomeza Kalisa Rachid awufashe ahita awamburwa na Migi, umusifuzi ahita asifura ikosa ryakozwe mbere ntibyishimirwa n'abafana ba APR FC

17:01

67' Imyitwarire mibi ya Babicka Shavy imuhesheje ikarita y'umuhondo

Ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports iri gusatira cyane ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura. Izamukanye umupira Vincent Habamahoro acomekera Babicka ariko Buregeya Prince amurusha ingufu arawurenza. Umujinya wa Babicka w'umunya-Gabon utumye asunika Buregeya Prince bimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo

16:55

61' Kwirinda ikarita itukura bitumye Mirafa Nizeyimana asimbuzwa

Nyuma yo kubona ko Nizeyimana Mirafa ari gukora amakosa menshi kandi yamaze guhabwa ikarita y'umuhondo, umutoza Jimmy Mulisa amusimbuje Blaise Itangishaka. Uyu niwo mukino wa mbere Nizeyimana Mirafa akinnye nyuma y'ibihano by'ikarita itukura yahawe ku mukino APR FC yatsinzemo Rayon Sports

16:50

55' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere y'umukino

Nizeyimana Jean Claude Rutsiro azamukanye umupira agana ku izamu rya Kimenyi akorerwa ikosa na Nizeyimana Mirafa bimuviramo ikarita y'umuhondo

16:49

Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Rutahizamu Issa Bigirimana agonganye na Shavy Babicka aravunika bimuviramo gusimbuzwa Maxime Sekamana

16:42

Amafoto y'igice cya mbere

16:40

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Rutahizamu Byiringiro Lague atangije igice cya kabiri nyuma yo gufata umunota wo kwibuka umufana wa APR FC witwa Deborah witabye imana kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 19 Ukuboza 2018

16:22

Igice cya mbere kirangiye APR FC iyoboye umukino

Nubwo Kiyovu Sports yagerageje guhererekanya neza mu minota 45 ya mbere y'umukino ariko ntabwo yashoboye kugera kenshi ku izamu rya Kimenyi Yves. Mu gihe APR FC yo iri gukoresha neza amahirwe yayo bigatuma isatira izamu rya Nzeyurwanda cyane, aho yanabonye igitego cyatsinzwe na Byiringiro Lague

16:19

45' APR FC ihushije igitego cyashoboraga kuyiha umutekano

Byiringiro Lague ahaye umupira Ombolenga Fitina ahindura umupira mwiza imbere y'izamu ashaka umutwe wa Issa Bigirimana umupira unamugeraho neza ariko awutera hanze y'izamu nubwo benshi mu bakunzi ba APR FC bari bakibaze

16:14

40' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports

Mu buryo butunguranye umutoza Kirasa Alain atunguranye akuramo Nizeyimana Djuma rutahizamu ufite ibitego bitanu muri shampiyona, byinshi kurusha abandi ba Kiyovu, amusimbuza Kalisa Rachid uje kongera imberaga hagati mu kibuga hagaragaraga intege nke!

16:10

35' Kiyovu Sports yacanye umuriro imbere y'izamu rya APR FC

Shavy Babick, Nizeyimana Djuma na Almer bazamukanye umupira bahererekanya neza bagera imbere y'izamu Almer acenga Herve Rugwiro ariko agerageje gutera mu izamu ntiyahirwa umupira ujya ku ruhande

16:02

29' Ntwari Evode wa APR FC ahushije igitego asigaranye n'umunyezamu

Abakinnyi bo hagati ba Kiyovu Sports bakomeje gusiga icyuho biri gutuma Mirafa, Migi na Evode bisanzura. Ntwari Evode azamukanye umupira awuhawe na Savio Nshuti acenga Placide asigarana n'umunyezamu Nzeyurwanda ariko atera iruhande rw'izamu

15:59

25' Kiyovu Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Abanyamahanga babiri ba Kiyovu Sports bakora itandukaniro. Almer ukomoka muri Cameroun na Babick ukomoka muri Gabon bazamukanye umupira bahererekanya bacenga ba myugariro ba APR FC ariko Migi akorera ikosa Almer havamo Coup franc, muri metero nka 25 gusa uvuye ku izamu rya Kimenyi, iterwa na Nizeyimana Djuma ariko urukuta rutabara APR FC rukuramo umupira

15:48

Amafoto y'amakipe yombi yishyushya mbere yo gutangira umukino

15:48

16' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA APR FC

Ku burangare bwa myugariro Serumogo Ally ukina ku ruhande rw'ibumoso, Byiringiro Lague wa APR FC azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso agera mu rubuga rw'amahina acenga Ngirimana Alexis ahindukiza umunyezamu Nzeyurwanda Djihad Jimmy.

15:47

Gukina APR FC idafite Muhadjiri Hakizimana byayizahaje

Ikipe ya APR FC iri gukina uyu mukino idafite rutahizamu wayo Muhadjiri Hakizimana wavunitse mu itako

15:44

10' Amakosa ya Nizeyimana Mirafa yari atsindishije APR FC igitego

APR FC ifite amakosa hagati mu kibuga muri iyi minota ya mbere. Nizeyimana Mirafa atakaje umupira ufatwa neza na Shavy Babicka ahita awucomekera mugenzi we Ghyslain Almer wari usigaranye n'umunyezamu ariko umusifuzi yemeza ko yaraririye

15:44

10' Amakosa ya Nizeyimana Mirafa yari atsindishije APR FC igitego

APR FC ifite amakosa hagati mu kibuga muri iyi minota ya mbere. Nizeyimana Mirafa atakaje umupira ufatwa neza na Shavy Babicka ahita awucomekera mugenzi we Ghyslain Almer wari usigaranye n'umunyezamu ariko umusifuzi yemeza ko yaraririye

15:36

04' Koruneri ya mbere y'umukino

Ntwari Evode azamukanye umupira neza agerageza gucenga Serumogo Ally ariko uyu myugariro wa Kiyovu Sports arawurenza bivamo Koruneri yatewe neza na Issa Bigirimana ariko myugariro Alexis Ngirimana akiza izamu

15:32

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi

15:31

Umukino uratangye

Umukino utangijwe na rutahizamu wa Kiyovu Sports Jean Claude Nizeyimana bita Rutsiro

15:30

Umukino ugiye kuyoborwa n'umusifuzi mpuzamahanga

Kuko ari umukino ugiye guhuza amakipe akomeye mu mateka, FERWAFA yahisemo ko uyoborwa n'umusufuzi mpuzamahanga Ruzindana Nsoro

15:08

Amakipe yombi yabukereye

15:03

APR FC ni yo iyoboye urutonde

15:01

Imwe mu mikino iheruka hagati y'aya makipe

15:00

Icyo imibare ivuga ku kuri uyu mukino

Mu mikino 18 ya shampiyona iheruka guhuza izi mpande zombi mu myaka icyenda ishize, APR FC yatsinze 17, Kiyovu Sports itsinda umukino umwe yatsinze tariki 27 Ukwakira 2017, ntabwo amakipe yombi aranganya na rimwe. Muri iyi mikino APR FC yinjije ibitego 40 naho Kiyovu Sports yinjiza ibitego bitanu gusa.

14:59

Ni amakipe yahoze ahanganye ariko ubu imwe ifite intege nke


Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Kiyovu Sports yari ikipe ikomeye igura abakinnyi bafite amazina byatumye ihangana na APR FC, rimwe na rimwe zombi zigahagararira u Rwanda mu marushanwa mpuzamahanga ariko iri hangana ryacitse intege kuko Kiyovu Sports mu myaka 10 ishize itagifite imbaraga nyinshi.

14:58

Ni iyihe kipe itanga Noheli ku bafana bayo?

Igicamunsi cyiza!

Turi kuri Stade ya Kigali ahagiye kubera umukino wâ€™umunsi wa 10 wa Shampiyona yâ€™u Rwanda uhuza amwe mu makipe akuze, akunzwe kandi yâ€™ubukombe mu mupira wâ€™amaguru wâ€™u Rwanda, aho APR FC igiye kwakira Kiyovu Sports.
